    Serialized Form

    • Package cat.dam.roig.cleanstream.config

      • Class cat.dam.roig.cleanstream.config.PreferencesData

        class PreferencesData extends Object implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • createM3u
            boolean createM3u
            Indicates whether an M3U playlist file should be generated when downloading playlists.
          • downloadDir
            String downloadDir
            Directory where downloaded media files will be stored.
          • ffmpegPath
            String ffmpegPath
            Absolute path to the ffmpeg executable.
          • limitSpeedEnabled
            boolean limitSpeedEnabled
            Indicates whether download speed limitation is enabled.
          • openWhenDone
            boolean openWhenDone
            Indicates whether the downloaded file should be automatically opened with the system default media player after completion.
          • scanFolderPath
            String scanFolderPath
            Directory that will be scanned for existing downloaded media.
          • speedKbps
            int speedKbps
            Maximum download speed in kilobytes per second (KB/s). Only applied if limitSpeedEnabled is true.
          • ytDlpPath
            String ytDlpPath
            Absolute path to the yt-dlp executable.

    • Package cat.dam.roig.cleanstream.ui.models

      • Class cat.dam.roig.cleanstream.ui.models.MetadataTableModel

        class MetadataTableModel extends AbstractTableModel implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • cols
            String[] cols
            Column headers for the table.
          • rows
            List<String[]> rows
            Internal table rows. Each row has exactly 2 columns: property and value.

    • Package cat.dam.roig.cleanstream.ui.renderers

      • Class cat.dam.roig.cleanstream.ui.renderers.ResourceDownloadedRenderer

        class ResourceDownloadedRenderer extends JPanel implements Serializable

        • Serialized Fields

          • lblBadge
            JLabel lblBadge
            Small colored badge representing the resource state (LOCAL/CLOUD/BOTH).
          • lblIcon
            JLabel lblIcon
            Leading icon representing the resource (video/audio/file).
          • lblSub
            JLabel lblSub
            Subtitle with compact metadata (1 line).
          • stateByFileName
            Map<String, ResourceState> stateByFileName
            Map used to resolve the state (LOCAL_ONLY / CLOUD_ONLY / BOTH) by filename. Key must be normalized using ResourceDownloadedRenderer.normalize(String).
          • textPanel
            JPanel textPanel
            Vertical panel that holds titleRow + subtitle.
          • titleRow
            JPanel titleRow
            Horizontal row that contains badge + title.
          • txtTitle
            JTextArea txtTitle
            Title text with wrapping enabled (max 2 lines). JTextArea is used because JLabel does not provide reliable wrapping.
